Text: @tdk2008  Range or (some) numbers of missing pages? I assume you read the WARNING in the description above or on page 2 of the PDF file. I checked each and every bookmark before uploading and everything looked OK. Maybe pages between bookmarks... TIA
Yeah, probably. Some pages are surely missing.
Could you please upload it again?

I asked you to provide the numbers of a few missing pages and cautioned you not to use Adobe Reader or Adobe Acrobat to read the file. Any update on this? With 500+ downloads so far and its fingerprints all over the torrent world, I will (try to) fix and reupload the file if and only if I can ascertain there's something wrong with it in readers _other_ than from Adobe (Uploaded file tested OK in PDF-Xchange Viewer, stand alone, no plug-in). I tried to repair this complex Wiley PDF for Adobe products but quickly realised it would take much, much more time than for a Cengage Learning file, time I don't have.
ok man. I will download PDF Xchange  viewer. Thanks for the help. No offense.
Thanks for the upload. You are doing god's work my friend.
